data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xuming Pan (2016): Seven scuticociliates (Protozoa, Ciliophora) from Alabama, USA, with descriptions of two parasitic species isolated from a freshwater mussel Potamilus purpuratus. European Journal of Taxonomy 249: 1-19, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2016.249
